channel.title: Tools on GNU/Linux Toolkit
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on GNU/Linux Toolkit

item.title: templating
item.description: File Templating CMake can format input files with variables specified in CMakeLists.txt, and produce an output in the build folder. . ├── CMakeLists.txt └── format-in.txt CMakeLists.txt configure_file(format-in.txt format-out.txt)format-in.txt The project version is: @Main_VERSION_MAJOR@

item.title: ffmpeg
item.description: ffmpeg is a video and image manipulator tool that can do just about anything.

item.title: cmake
item.description: CMake is a tool that creates build setups for source code, allowing that code to be cross platform. The root of a CMake entity is always defined by a CMakeLists.txt file. Bare Minimum Example File Templating

item.title: cmake
item.description: Bare Minimum Example . ├── CMakeLists.txt └── main.cpp CMakeLists.txt cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)project(Main)add_executable(Main main.cpp)mkdir build cd build && cmake ..
